text:
Need Help Urgent

We have form in HubSpot and on form submission we are getting file from file type and it's saving file as private but we need it as public. Can someone please help on this ?

Hi <@U05JM97G4NB> - Please provide more details and I'll see how I can help.

Here we have image gallery and we are showing images from submitted image
